Package org.apache.batik.dom.anim

Interface Summary
AnimatableElement An interface for animatable elements to expose their underlying values to the compositing functions in AbstractAnimation.
AnimationTarget An interface for targets of animation to provide context information.
AnimationTargetListener A listener class for animation targets.
